QuestData.Title: Fragments of the Past
QuestData.Description: Though your primary objective is to liberate the tower from the Legion's hold, I have... another request.$b$bKarazhan is a place where magic and history intertwine. Moments of the past have been known to take physical form, and these forms can possess great power.$b$bAs you journey through Karazhan, watch for places where memories coalesce. These fragments could provide valuable insight into what's really going on inside that tower.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect the Soul Fragments from the Guest Chambers, Banquet Hall, Servant Quarters, Opera Hall and the Menagerie inside Karazhan.
